title: samayamidhi gaadurA (jaavali)
sahitya:
samayamidi gAdurA nA sAmi 

anupallavi

 virasamutO nA iNTivArilO nannu vijitamugA kanukonna gUDina vELa nAtO

caraNam 1

 niganigavenyalA kAyucunnadi nityamugA iTula jEsidi nIku
tagadurA I vidilO vaccuvAru tALanani nIcE cennanavvi tiTTudurA ganuka

caraNam 2

EkAntamugA jarigina sangati entaina paiTapaDEdiyAyamA 
shrIkAnta nIkEla inta dUramu shrInivAsArcita bhAvinILLupolli konnadirA
